import sys

n, k = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
prices = sorted([int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()])

print(sum(prices[:k]))
import sys

n, k = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
prices = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
prices.sort()
print(sum(prices[:k]))
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
p = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

print(sum(sorted(p)[:k]))

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())  # Get the number of elements and the number of groups
p = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))  # Get the elements

print(sum(sorted(p)[:k]))  # Print the sum of the smallest k elements
